name: AUST
description:
controls

  • right click + drag to scroll through texts
  • left click phone to read texts
  • "z" to start the game
  • "wasd" movement
  • "e" to interact

involved

  • maneuver through a 2.5d world
  • blend in with society or stand out
  • watch time go by
  • read your texts

in collaboration with Joshua Wilson
